ngiemboon: Ɔ̀ lɔɔn ńgwaa gʉa, ḿbí nkẅíŋ.
en: Before you leave, grab the wood.

ngiemboon: Á něŋ fÿág tsɛ̀ɛ kwò kwáŋ tà á gwǎ.
en: He put air in the inner tube of the bike so that it punctured.

ngiemboon: A gwǎ ńtó púʼu, peg ye pfɛ́ mmó.
en: He usually comes to eat with me.
sp. plant used to make a sticky sauce
